entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port Perry
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:17 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.2°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 9:14 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:14 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 9:14 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
